The Ocean that Dried Up: A young girl named Ava lived in a world where the ocean had dried up. She dreamed of swimming in the waves and exploring the depths of the sea. One day, she stumbled upon a magical fish that had the power to bring the ocean back to life. With the help of her friends, Ava used the fish's powers to restore the ocean and all its inhabitants.
